analysis.key_quote: I believe our Nation works best with an independent, nonpartisan civil service. Converting career civil servants to at will undermines an independent, nonpartisan civil service.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a nonpartisan civil service and the risks of politicization. It also raises concerns about the vagueness of the rule and its potential to undermine merit-based protections.
